title: This Shit is Done
body:
http://giphy.com/gifs/shrug-neil-degrasse-tyson-i-dont-care-jEirVKZl0JytW

Waters have calmed, balanced has been somewhat restored

**So I'm calling**

This... Not a wat, but more or less..

**Crisis**... Is over

Let this be the last post, and let it fade away before things become too mangled to fix. 

Airman's forces will remain, but shall be less recruit minded and more focused on the fun and enjoyment this board was established for

As for the Loyalists of Fish... I can not speak for them, but I assume they will continue as they please. 

I wish Laughing Fish the best in dealing with what he has to deal with, and may his followers not be surprised should he disappear, he may be your god, but even gods need a break. 

I'm not sure what Airman's next move will be, but should she choose to attempt another conflict

I shall have no choice but to leave her services and march on my own. 

**ALREADY FORMAL SHIT IS DEALT WITH**

But seriously guys, we're done, no one wants this, let the horse die and let us not find another to take its place

And let's remember just how stupid this shit did get and could have gotten to if we allowed it to continue.

Once more though 

**THIS SHIT IS OVER**

replies.body: http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/gone-done.gif
The best part is that the violent one is calling for a war to end
https://media.riffsy.com/images/a1b9877b40e0221cc971ce3b65329f8d/raw
http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m1powhRVdz1rqnp16o2_500.gif
If only this could easely be done about Teemo's hatred... It would make me the happiest yordle main in the boards. ALL OF THEM!
Impossible, one cannot be unhappy with {{champion:78}} here, if you catch my drift...
Teemo x Poppy confirmed

> [{quoted}](name=Aqualious18,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=qz94EQAp,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2016-07-13T23:35:13.920+0000)
>
> Teemo x Poppy confirmed

Poppy wouldn't stand a chance, not with that one liner that makes her act odd amongst other yordles.

> [{quoted}](name=SuperEccles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=qz94EQAp,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2016-07-13T22:51:33.295+0000)
>
> Impossible, one cannot be unhappy with {{champion:78}} here, if you catch my drift...

Not really, I can't... ._.
Dealing with a champions opinion and doing with an Internet war, are apparently two different things, who knew an internet war would be easier to solve

> [{quoted}](name=Aqualious18,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=qz94EQAp,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-07-13T20:08:34.265+0000)
>
> Dealing with a champions opinion and doing with an Internet war, are apparently two different things, who knew an internet war would be easier to solve

Champion's opinions are also well changed. I've seen people one month complain about Ekko or Katarina being OP, now they're either silent or nearly non existent.

But Teemo could get nerfed to a state where he's not even good for support, but their opinions of him still linger on... For no reason.
Perhaps the identity of Teemo has just been to related to a monster for people to see past it, A sad an unfortunate truth

> [{quoted}](name=Aqualious18,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=qz94EQAp,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-13T20:19:24.576+0000)
>
> Perhaps the identity of Teemo has just been to related to a monster for people to see past it, A sad an unfortunate truth

Even monsters can be forgiven... Eventually...

*gently pets*

I know... I forgave you

> [{quoted}](name=Aqualious18,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=qz94EQAp,comment-id=000300000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-13T20:35:30.952+0000)
>
> *gently pets*
> 
> I know... I forgave you

Always a nice step to start with...
Where's The Tarians disappear too?

> [{quoted}](name=Aqualious18,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=qz94EQAp,comment-id=00030000000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2016-07-13T20:56:16.775+0000)
>
> Where's The Tarians disappear too?

Hope not, I like him because he's a memer that mains a yordle too! D:
He'll turn up... I hope

> [{quoted}](name=Aqualious18,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=qz94EQAp,comment-id=0003000000000000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2016-07-13T22:27:42.553+0000)
>
> He'll turn up... I hope

Hopefuly, even added him in the NA servers in case we meet up.
All big things, start with small steps

It's a heat seeker this time, HURRY

*throws knife*

GONNA RUN TIL THE DAY I DIE

Since edit function on my phone is a bitch:

I don't usually ask for upvotes and comments but

**PLEASE DO SO, THEN THIS CAN BE NOTICED MORE AND MARKED AS THE TRUE END AND WE CAN ALL GO BACK TO OUR FUCKING NON-EXISTENT LIVES**

Thanks

You can cut and paste the whole thread, that way find yourself at the bottom of it, and you will be able to write there.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Also, you can switch to the full site through your phone by opening the tab, that way you can also post some stickers and stuff from your phone
https://media1.giphy.com/media/xTiTno1ju4OXEUL5Sg/200w.gif
Thank you
https://img.pandawhale.com/post-28941-hello-old-sport-gif-Great-Gats-Iku2.gif

I haven't looked at the boards much past few days. What have i missed? Airman vs Fish? Interesting. 

Wish i coulda seen it. Prob wouldn't take a side though. 


http://www.fullredneck.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/Funny-Canada-Meme-8.jpg

The Canadian is offended

#Triggered
{{item:3070}} {{champion:120}} dun keel me pls
Now why would I want to kill you?
"let the horse die"
Oh... WELL ITS BEING BEATEN IN ITS GRAVE, SO WE MUST FREE IT TO THE AFTER LIFE
Don't beat a horse into Malcom. What did he ever do to you?
Peace... is it... true?
And... We won't use the Sun as a sacrifice for the Void either

Yes... It is true, I, one of the 5 pillars of Chaos, will not allow this board to fall into a toxic turmoi. 

And many of us here have discovered a new found distaste for this battle

This ends now
What even happened?
What happened? I thought everyone was joking or something

*Raises Hand*
Can I at least find a new horse so I can get home?

*Makes a phone call, 5 minutes Later Hecarium appears*

There, now ride on
Wow, slow pony
War, War never changes.
